name: Red Dot Targeting Laser
on_hit: DRONE, SEEKING, and NEXUS weapons and systems gain +1 Accuracy to attack the target until the end of their next turn.
on_crit: The target also receives Lock On.
description: A red dot sight is a type of optic that is typically used at closer ranges, normally around 100 yards or less... 'Typically'... this ain't a red dot sight... - FNET Engineer (on why the name change from blackspot to red dot)
